channel.title: dolls on Mary Fortuna - Detroit Michigan Artist
channel.description: Recent content in dolls on Mary Fortuna - Detroit Michigan Artist

item.title: Commissions and Kids Drawings
item.description: As the title suggests, a collection of collaborations, commissions, and kid’s drawings.

item.title: Dolls
item.description: A Collection of Mary Fortuna’s hand-crafted dolls. This collection includes nested, felt & fabric, and leather dolls.

item.title: Felt & Fabric Dolls
item.description: Felt and Fabric Dolls created by Mary Fortuna

item.title: Nesting Dolls
item.description: Nesting Dolls, also known as matryoshka, are surprisingly barely 100 years old.
